meanings.definition: A secondary heading or title that provides more specific information within a larger piece of text.
meanings.sent1: The subhead 'Important Dates' helped me find the schedule easily.
meanings.sent2: The article had a subhead that summarized the main point of each section.
meanings.sent3: The subhead 'Funny Facts' made me chuckle as I read through the list.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a subhead, drawing attention to the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The subhead 'Breaking News' caught my eye and made me stop to read more.
